Name: Snackbar 't Puntje
Review Text: Friendly owner, as good as a snackbar gets. Just watch out for the chairs outside. I've cut myself on the multiple  damaged sharp chairs outside the place. Luckily I got cut and not my kids.

Name: Snackbar 't Puntje
Review Text: Amazing snack bar. Still to this day the best Kapsalon's I've ever had and the owner is incredibly nice!

Name: Snackbar 't Puntje
Review Text: Amazing place, the best falafels I have ever had (besides the ones in Egypt). The owner is one of the most friendly persons I have ever met.

Name: Snackbar 't Puntje
Review Text: Tasty food and very good price. Friendly staff.
